website_summaries.verdict: Exploring the city streets in style and ease is what the Merrell Around Town City Lace all about. Many reviewers highlighted the superb cushioning, lightness, and comfort of this model found within the affordable price range.This shoe has been applauded for its easy-to-wear design that will make one's everyday styling effortless. While few criticized that this pair runs small, this shoe is still considered a nice go-to kick for day-to-day exploits.
pros: Most of the buyers reveal the Merrell Around Town City Lace Canvas l is very comfortable
Many buyers like the lightness of this sneaker
This shoe is found at an affordable price range
A handful of reviewers mention the superb cushioning of this kick
A couple of buyers cite that the Merrell Around Town City Lace Canvas is easy to wear
Few like the versatility of this sneaker that could match virtually any casual attire
One reviewer shares that this pair has sufficient ample support
This model is available in multiple colorways
cons: Few disappointed buyers disclose that the Around Town City Lace Canvas from Merrell runs a bit narrow
A buyer complains that this sneaker gets dirty easily

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, comfortable, well-designed
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought a pair of Merrells I didn't like, and these ones are no exception. I'm a 7, I ordered a 7, and it fits perfectly. Despite being a lightweight and flexible shoe and maybe not looking like it has a lot of support, these are still extremely comfortable. Lastly, it's totally unimportant, but I do love the design on the bottom of the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Jigglypuff

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return, this shoe is super uncomfortable. They fit fine when I put them on, but after some wear, Bought size 8. No arch support, gave me blisters on my little toes. Even my daughter who is size 6.5 had blisters from these on her little toes.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice canvas sneaker. Pretty color, and fits as expected. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Shoes appear very old after a couple of wearings.
customer_reviews.text: This product from Merrick surprised me in that the shoes when worn will twist at the toe box. It does not lay flat and it’s appearance is poor. Barely worn yet looks old.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. They are great to wear without socks, too. They hardly weigh anything, yet are very cushioned. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, runs a half size large
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Merrell's barefoot trail runners for awhile now and I figured it was time to try some of their casual shoes. I'm very happy with them! Much more comfortable than shoes of this style usually are. Note that they run about a half size large, which is also true of their barefoot shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ryleigh Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Felt great from the first time I had them on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Looks great too! As a person with foot issues,Iwasxamazed at how well these fit & how comfortable they are. Will be looking for more colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi O

customer_reviews.title: Fit and fashion
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes while Christmas shopping....I love them! They fit perfectly and feel so good. I had to order another pair so when I wear this pair out I'll have another! I've never done this with any other shoe. I LOVE THESE SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: DanaK

customer_reviews.title: I normally love Merrill shoes. This product that I received was a little imperfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Merrill tennis shoes for the price. The tongue of both shoes were a little crooked; therefore leaving a little crease or dimple at the first eyelet where the tongue starts. It doesn’t bother me enough to return.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: If you have feet problems, these are your sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These merrel sneakers are amazing. My feet feel relaxed and well supported in these, easy on feet during long walks and do not get hot inside.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely comfortable and so cute!!! Wore them for hours on end and my feet don’t hurt in them, They’re comfortable. I got the pinkishh orange ones. They are so adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: alesha

customer_reviews.title: Merrell shoes are the real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Merrell shoes are the only shoes I can order and I know they will fit perfect. So true to their size 100 percent . Well made and well worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: cmr1963

customer_reviews.title: Light & comfortable slightly less support
customer_reviews.text: Got to wear with skinny jeans. Comfortable but slightly less support than with other Merrill shoes I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn T

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the same quality as the Merell boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Materials are ok but construction feels a bit on the cheap side. Insoles are nothing like my merell boots which is a bummer. Little to no arch support.
customer_reviews.author: daniel turner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and lightweight. Perfect to slip on with a pair of shorts skirt or Capris.
customer_reviews.author: Seena Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is much lighter than other similar shoes I've tried. It has good room for toes, fits well and has good support. It is also very cute. I am on my feet all day and I love this shoe. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rech

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are worth about 8.00, - so don't waste your 80 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these shoes! They are cheap, thin canvas. The heel crushed before I even got my foot in.
customer_reviews.author: catherine woods

customer_reviews.title: Not normal Merrell quality.
customer_reviews.text: Felt like those cheap Ked knock-offs from when I was a kid. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Merrell.
customer_reviews.text: Ok but a little tight across top of foot. Will have to stretch shoe for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bunchy at top; otherwise very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Finkbeiner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take on a trip to Rome. They were perfect❗️Lightweight, very comfortable and cute😀
customer_reviews.author: Elisa N

customer_reviews.title: Love all my Merrells
customer_reviews.text: Love all my Merrells! These shoes are so light you almost forget you're wearing shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kostal

customer_reviews.title: Merrell athletic shoes work better for me
customer_reviews.text: These were a little stiffer than I expected & although I love the color, they were just different enough from what I wanted. Not quite as comfortable as my Merrell sneakers that I love. Sadly, had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: JMinGHWA

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Around Town City Lace Canvas Sneaker
product_meta.description: Explore fearlessly. With a durable upper that goes the distance, and m select™ cush ultra lightweight technology to keep you comfortable, around town city lace is about dress life in style.
feature_bullets: Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
Kinetic Fit Base removable contoured insole for flexible support
